topics.title: Adjusting the Constant
topics.description: Changing the constant value to affect the controller output.
evidence_quotes: We can adjust our constant value.
If we set it to 2, the speed will be slower...

topics.title: Controller Output
topics.description: Setting the constant value and calculating the controller output.
evidence_quotes: Let's set our constant, kp, to some arbitrary value like 5.
So we multiply 5 by that error to get our controller output...

topics.title: Cruise Control System
topics.description: Designing a controller for the cruise control system.
evidence_quotes: Now, let's turn our attention back to the cruise control system that we're designing...
We'll say our accelerator position can go from 0 to 10 centimeters.

topics.title: Error and Speed
topics.description: Graphing the error and speed, and how they change over time.
evidence_quotes: If we graph our error and speed, we should see something like this.
The error starts at 10 kilometers, and the speed is proportionally high, at 50 kilometers per hour.

topics.title: PID Controller Tuning
topics.description: Tuning a PID controller involves adjusting kp, ki, and kd to achieve optimal performance.
